original: intros m z t H1 H2. split. - intro H3. apply exds_orb_ex in H3 as [i [H4 H5]]. unfold expo. split. + apply exd_Iter_upb. apply H1. apply exds_orb_ex in H3 as [i [H4 H5]]. apply H5. + exists i. rewrite <- H5. apply H5. - intro H3. apply exds_orb_eq_ex in H3 as [i [H4 H5]]. unfold expo. destruct (expo_dec m z t) as [H6 | H6]. + apply H6. + exfalso. apply H6. apply H3.
